item.title: Eventstore API
item.description: As an exercise we have hugely simplfied the API while trying to find the relevant details necessary to implement this workshop. The API for every language looks the same. It has an EventStore with one method replay. The replay method takes two arguments: the streamname and a projection. item.title: Generating data
item.description: Download the generator You can download the generator for Windows, Mac or Linux. Move the executable to the base folder where you want to put your code as well and run the generator in a terminal (depending on your OS you need to give the binary executable rights). On both Mac and Windows you might get warnings that the executable is not signed, but you can still run it. The data The generator will generate 2 files: data/basic.
